definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: No one knows what regulations apply to crypto-equity yet.
sentences.chinese: 没有人知道什么样的法规能适用于加密股权。

sentences.english: This will give Yahoo direct and indirect ownership of 37 per cent of Alibaba.com.
sentences.chinese: 此举将令雅虎直接和间接持有阿里巴巴37%的股权。

sentences.english: For executives, it is common to have longer-term rewards such as stock options.
sentences.chinese: 对于主管们，长期的酬谢包括认股权。

sentences.english: Equity swap between shareholders of the listed company and shareholders of Huixin Futures.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司股东与汇鑫期货股东进行股权置换。

sentences.english: None were cancelled or lapsed during the period.
sentences.chinese: 于期内，概无任何购股权遭注销或作废。

sentences.english: to formulate work plans for dispatching representatives of state stock ownership to the state holding and joint-stock corporations.
sentences.chinese: 拟订向国有控股和参股公司派出国有股权代表的方案。

sentences.english: Equity financing also requires a willingness to share management control with the investors.
sentences.chinese: 股权融资还要求自愿与投资商分享经营管理权。

sentences.english: The stock transaction which the banker was spelling out was fair.
sentences.chinese: 这个银行家详加说明的股权处理，还是公平合理的。

sentences.english: Do you plan to go for debt or equity financing?
sentences.chinese: 你是打算进行债务融资还是股权融资？

sentences.english: Zhang listed the exact share structure of the new company and the dates of its registration.
sentences.chinese: 章知方说明了新公司的具体股权结构以及注册日期。

sentences.english: Thirdly, we should make use of ownership balance reasonably.
sentences.chinese: 最后建议上市公司合理利用股权制衡的治理作用。

sentences.english: The relevant provisions of the state shall be followed in the transfer of state-owned equities of listed companies.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司的国有股权转让，按照国家有关规定执行。

sentences.english: II. A fund may actively invest in the equity shares as issued in the share-trading reform.
sentences.chinese: 基金可以主动投资于在股权分置改革中发行的权证。

sentences.english: The sale of the CICC stake also is politically sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 出售中金公司股权也具有政治上的敏感性。

sentences.english: Its stake in PAE is one of the company's most prized Latin American assets.
sentences.chinese: PAE股权是BP最有价值的拉美资产之一。

sentences.english: At present, the overseas listed company also plans to implement equity-based incentives.
sentences.chinese: 目前，海外上市公司还计划实施股权激励。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
